snippet: Joseph L. Bruno, a former State Senate majority leader, is facing federal charges for a second time. His 2009 conviction was thrown out by a higher court.
abstract: Former New York State Sen Joseph L Bruno returns to court to face federal fraud charges for second time, as well as possibility of prison if convicted; Bruno was first accused of fraud in 2009, only to have conviction thrown out by higher court; prosecutors won approval in 2013 for second trial.
lead_paragraph: Joseph L. Bruno, a former State Senate majority leader, is facing federal charges for a second time. His 2009 conviction was thrown out by a higher court.

headline.main: Ex-State Senate Leader on Trial Again for Fraud
headline.print_headline: Ex-State Senate Leader on Trial Again for Fraud
